name: I am Gaurav Kumar
description: My name is Gaurav Kumar and I am a full stack developer.
my-description: I have been working on web designing and web development for 1 year. Constantly updating the technologies I already master, but also looking to learn new technologies to enrich my skills and improve my good practices as a developer.
design-info: Design of attractive interfaces for both web and mobile users, making the most of the brand or product that the client wishes to exploit on their website
development-info: Creation of well-structured web pages, good responsive design, attractive color palette, with interactions that give the user satisfaction when browsing the website.
marketing-info: Prepare a strategy and objectives for the promotion of the brand provided by the client, using the internet or other platforms to promote products and services of the brand in question.
maintenance-info: Complete maintenance of web pages to detect and solve errors, update content whether text, photos, web design elements, add new functions, etc.
seo-info: Web positioning through SEO, so your website appears in the main search results according to your business, both in Google, Bing, or other internet search engines
optimization-info: Complete optimization of your web page, improving loading speed, using optimized images, a good URL, to give a better experience to users who visit the website
about-info-1: Hi, I'm Gaurav Kumar, a BTech student at Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology; I consider myself a person passionate about programming and web development since I started working on web development projects like 'Show Time' and 'Xplore World.'
about-info-2: I consider myself a self-taught person since I like to be constantly learning day by day, both new technologies and new development methods that help me polish and raise my level of learning.
about-info-3: I have experience working as a freelance web designer and developer, which gave me the opportunity to work on many interesting projects, adapting to the client's needs and budget, which allowed me to improve my skills and knowledge; Additionally, I have also completed internships at Celebal Technology and Bharat Intern, where I enhanced my skills in full-stack development.
about-skills-1: One year of professional experience in this language, allows me to perform without problems in the industry.
about-skills-2: One year of work experience in this language, I use it daily to develop web designs and interfaces.
about-skills-3: A year of experience using it in front-end and back-end development, allowed me to familiarize myself with the language, and include it in my work projects.
about-skills-4: One year using this preprocessor in the professional field, I include it in many of my projects since it allows me a better structured code.
about-skills-5: Less than a year using this framework, even so, I used it in numerous work projects, which allowed me to get to know it for the most part.
about-skills-6: One year using this library in the personal and work environment, it is one of the libraries that I use and manipulate the most.
about-skills-7: More than a year using this JavaScript framework, carrying out multiple personal and work projects.
about-skills-8: It is the cross-platform runtime environment that I use to make my web applications scalable.
about-skills-9: It is a framework that I use mostly to be able to manage my APIs in the best way and my http execution model.
services-questions-1: What is a responsive web page?
services-questions-p1: It is that page that is capable of adapting to any device where it is viewed, such as cell phones, tablets, laptops, without losing appearance or usability.
services-questions-2: What is a Domain and a Hosting?
services-questions-p2: Both are essential elements of a website. In short, the domain name is the address of the web page, while the hosting provides the space and resources necessary to launch the website.
services-questions-p3: Regular maintenance of your website allows you to attract and retain customers with new information, new products and services, in addition to helping you maintain or improve your ranking in Google.
services-questions-p4: You can pay online by credit or debit cards and payments by transfers.
projects-info-17-p1: Show Time, a ticket booking web application.
projects-info-17-p2: Designed to visually attract users with an intuitive interface and smooth transitions.
projects-info-16-p1: Xplore World, a web project showcasing popular places to explore.
projects-info-16-p2: Developed to provide users with information about travel destinations, their attractions, and experiences.
projects-info-15-p1: Smart Crop Recommendation, a responsive web page for agriculture.
projects-info-15-p2: Provides crop recommendations based on environmental factors, helping farmers make better decisions.
projects-info-14-p2: A personal portfolio showcasing my work, projects, and skills in web development.
projects-info-13-p2: A simple music streaming platform with basic functionalities inspired by Spotify.
projects-info-12-p2: A temperature conversion tool for converting between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.
projectsApp-info-11-p2: Manage client appointments for mobile phone repairs.
projectsApp-info-10-p2: Allows users to add, mark, and sort tasks.
projectsApp-info-9-p2: A time management tool to track work and break intervals.
projectsApp-info-8-p2: Calculates weekly expenses with a preset budget.
